channel.title: Simple Quick Question
channel.description:
Is it possible in Windows Movie Maker to make it on a loop or repeat like a .gif, If so how do I do it?
Thanks.[br][size=1]Posted on: May 18, 2007, 06:47:49 AM[/size][hr]Sorry for the double post but I really need to know how to do this.

item.title: Simple Quick Question
